overview: Bucolic lawyer John Wayne takes on big-city corruption in A Man Betrayed. He sets out to prove that an above-suspicion politician (Edward Ellis) is actually a crook. The price of integrity is sweet in this instance, since Wayne happens to be in love with the politician's daughter (Frances Dee).
tagline: Fearless! Stalking his prey in a stronghold of corruption...Daring death for the woman he loves!
title: A Man Betrayed
